Posts.EditableText:
Hello to all. I have made an individual walkthrough in individual locations to help you out of the areas (Just type in walkthrough in places like the bedroom, but only if you are really stuck)
P. S. So far I have done this in three locations to help you out to the courtyard, I will continue to do this for other locations if needed. Thanks Terry
